scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary holding the Christ Child, both with golden halos. Mary is dressed in a blue robe, and the Christ Child is nude. To the right, a black, horned demon with sharp teeth and claws stands menacingly, holding a staff. In the foreground, a man in a red robe and green sash kneels with his hands clasped in prayer, looking up towards the Virgin and Child. Behind them, a lush green landscape unfolds with trees and a distant city with spires. The scene is framed by an ornamental border.
